items.title: Share a photo/video or a favorite Charlie quote
items.desc: Post a photo or video, OR include a Charlie quote that inspires you. Tag 3 friends and invite them to act within 48 hours.

items.title: Pete & Bobby Challenge (Health)
items.desc: Choose one healthy action today—walk a mile, make a healthy meal with family, schedule a checkup—and share why health matters to your mission.

items.title: Share a verse with a friend
items.desc: Pick a verse, include it in your post, and tell why it matters right now.

items.title: Serve
items.desc: Help a neighbor, teacher, veteran, or first responder. Share the story and how others can repeat it this week.

items.title: Forgive
items.desc: Share a short forgiveness story (no private details needed) and encourage reconciliation.

items.title: Family Life
items.desc: Do something intentional with your family (meal, game night, bay walk). Post the moment and why family is your priority.

items.title: Stand & Speak (Podium)
items.desc: Attend a civic meeting or youth group and speak respectfully for truth. Share what you said and learned.

items.title: Invite to Church
items.desc: Personally invite someone and post a simple invite graphic or story.

items.title: Share Christ (Evangelism)
items.desc: Share a testimony or talk about what following Jesus means to you.

items.title: Bridge Builder (Note/Call/Visit)
items.desc: Write a thank-you note, make a phone call, or visit someone who needs encouragement.

items.title: Public Testimony (Online Post)
items.desc: State clearly what you believe and why—with humility and courage.

items.title: Film Night Host (Christian Film Night)
items.desc: Host a watch party and pray/discuss afterward. Post the group pic + takeaways.

items.title: Favorite Charlie Video (Share + why)
items.desc: Share a clip, add your takeaway, and tag 3 friends to share theirs.

items.title: Hands-Free Driver (No phone while driving)
items.desc: Pledge to put the phone away while driving today. Share the reminder to protect families on the road.

items.title: Family Table Focus (Streak)
items.desc: Eat together without screens for 3+ nights. Post what changed.

items.title: Quiet Time Focus (Streak)
items.desc: Set a daily window for Scripture/prayer for 7 days. Share one insight.

items.title: Honor Service (Thank a First Responder)
items.desc: Deliver a thank-you and a small gift. Post the story (with permission).

items.title: Creator Proceeds Donor
items.desc: Donate proceeds from your video/stream/book for the day. Post the receipt (blur private info).

items.title: YouTube Proceeds Donor
items.desc: Pledge one stream’s ads/superchat to charity. Share the proof link or screenshot.

items.title: Phone Off at Church
items.desc: Go distraction-free during worship. Post a simple reminder graphic.

items.title: Inspire
items.desc: Share an original encouragement for others choosing, like Charlie.

items.title: BakeLikeCharlie (Bake & Sell)
items.desc: Host a bake sale with family or youth. Donate proceeds and post the story.

items.title: Generations Badge (3+ generations together)
items.desc: Grandparent + parent + child complete an action together and share a photo/story.

items.title: Gold Standard — Doing It All
items.desc: Do at least one action in every category this month. Post your highlight reel.

items.title: Pray for Your Leaders (Name them)
items.desc: Post a prayer for leaders by name—national, state, local, church.

items.title: Register to Vote (or Verify)
items.desc: Check your registration or register; share your confirmation link and help a friend do the same.

items.title: Local School Support (Teacher/Classroom help)
items.desc: Ask what’s needed, bring supplies, or volunteer time. Share the win.

items.title: Veteran Visit (Honor & Listen)
items.desc: Visit a veteran or VA home. Listen to their story; thank and pray for them.

items.title: Small Business Shoutout (Buy Local)
items.desc: Buy from a local shop and tell others why you chose them.

items.title: Community Clean-Up (Before/After pics)
items.desc: Pick a park/street, gather trash, and post before/after photos.

items.title: Meal Train Start (Bless a Family)
items.desc: Start or join a meal train for a family in need. Share the link.

items.title: Coach or Mentor (Youth)
items.desc: Volunteer to coach or mentor at church/school. Invite others.

items.title: First Bible Give-Away
items.desc: Give someone their first Bible. Include a note in the front; share the story (with permission).

items.title: Scripture Memory (7 verses)
items.desc: Memorize 7 verses this week. Share the list and your progress.

items.title: Pro-Life Serve Day (Pray/Support)
items.desc: Serve a local pregnancy center (donations, prayer, volunteering). Post how to help.

items.title: Marriage Night (Invest in your covenant)
items.desc: Plan a distraction-free date night. Share one thing you’re building together.

items.title: Apologetics Share (1 reason for your hope)
items.desc: Share one reason you trust the Gospel—winsomely and briefly.

items.title: Read Aloud with Kids (Chapter a night)
items.desc: Choose a book and read aloud nightly. Post a family pic + title.

items.title: Add Your Church (Directory link)
items.desc: Post your church link and invite others in your city to visit.

items.title: Host a Like-Charlie Meetup (5+ people)
items.desc: Gather 5+ friends to take actions together; post a group photo and plan.

items.title: Testimony Video (60–90 sec)
items.desc: Record a short testimony video and post with #LiveLikeCharlie.

items.title: Worship Playlist Share (Top 10)
items.desc: Share a top-10 worship playlist and why these songs matter.
